Nerangs.ab: aṣ̌aiia daδąmi xᵛarəθəm miiazdəm čīyōn pad yašt bēd tā sar ud pad kardag ēsm ud bōy pad tadsōiδiš ud asnai harw čahār čīyōn pad srōš drōn nibišt pas tā parāhōm xward tā āca manō sar čīyōn pad wisperad bēd

"(They should recite) aṣ̌aiia daδąmi xᵛarəθəm miiazdəm as it is in the Yašt until the end. At the section (kardag), (the rāspīg has to bring?) esm and bōy (to the fire). At tat̰ sōiδiš and asnai, (he has to perform) all four as it is written in the Srōš Drōn. Then (he continues) until the partaking of the parāhōm and until the end of āca manō so as it is in the Visperad."
